DOC.brief_summary: We try use data mining method find new model factor affect progression diabetes mellitus .
DOC.brief_title: Diabetes Mellitus Care Decision Making Model Through Data Mining
DOC.detailed_description: The advanced development medical technology lead accumulation large amount medical data . Unfortunately , useful meaningful clinical data properly manage analyze . Therefore , data mining technology become essential instrument hospital management medical research . Possible meaningful information obtain database data mining . About 2,000 diabetic patient enrol Diabetes Care Program since Oct 2002 hospital . We intend look determine factor affect prognosis diabetes mellitus patient group .
DOC.criteria: diabetes mellitus enrol Diabetes Care Program year 2002 2007 .
